physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood pressure high of 214/112 mmHg (after discontinuing amlodipine)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe psychomotor retardation, ongoing confusion and poor decision making observed over a month.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial improvement in mood and energy after increasing dosages of fluoxetine and aripiprazole; average step count increased from 836 to approximately 4,000 steps per day.
